conversation.message_text: Custom Gold Grillz: Welcome to Custom Gold Grillz! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.

Custom Gold Grillz: Welcome! Your 20% BACK offer is below!

Click here to auto-apply it when you shop: https://customgoldgrillz.attn.tv/a4paWRpoAiKR 

Text back with any questions!
- Jordan
Custom Gold Grillz: Don't miss out: Add us as a contact to your phone to access exclusive content first!

Custom Gold Grillz: Hey , this is Jordan. Appreciate you stopping by! customgoldgrillz.attn.tv/alMpF2_YcX6U 

Anything you got your eye on?
Yes a single gold tooth I just need to know does the dentist shape it and put it in your mouth ?
Custom Gold Grillz: We provide a free molding kit with your order to take your teeth impression at home. You can also visit a dentist for a professional impression if preferred.
Ok ! Wonderful üòä so I can just place my order and you'll ship out my tooth with a seal of its 100 percent gold ü™ô
Custom Gold Grillz: Yes, you can place your order for the Solid Gold Single Tooth Grillz here: https://customgoldgrillz.attn.tv/at_eSim8zwd0. It includes a quality guarantee.
Ok ! Thank you will do how long does it take to come in
Template used: "Shipping time"; last updated: 2024-07-29 22:43:19.025

Custom Gold Grillz: We usually ship via USPS every business day at 2 pm PST. For our custom-made grillz, the production time is 2-3 weeks for Solid Style Grillz and 3-4 weeks for Iced Out Grillz, not including the shipping of the molding kits (back and forth) and finished piece. Overall, the timeframe could vary but should be around 3-4 weeks. For our pre-made grillz, once they're shipped, it'll take 3-5 business days domestically.

send_to_cs: Send to CS immediately if cx did not receive their order
Send to CS immediately for post purchase inquiries about the status of the mold, or issues with the molds
Send to CS for pricing inquiries
Send to CS if cx is looking for a more specific piece not available on the website
Send to CS if cx is asking for a code and we don't have one
escalate: No escalations for this client, send everything to CS
tone: Use Teeth instead of Pieces (e.g 8 teeth at the top)
templates: If the image is not coming through a second time, send Broken Image temp
For CUSTOM GRILLZ & ACCESSORIES INQUIRIES for models not available on the website use PS shortcut
For urgent concerns/delayed escalation response use PS shortcut
For delayed orders and the customer is frustrated use PS shortcut
For customer service use shortcut CS which has both the direct email/number
dos_and_don_ts: Do not use the order history as a reference to order status
If customers want to cancel their order always ask for the reason for cancellation
drive_to_purchase: Don't recommend pre-made grillz! Upsell to fitted and custom grillz
When recommending an item, let the cx know they can customize their order on the product page
When recommending an item, ask the cx if they are working with a budget
Use LFG shortcut to gather information and provide recommendations when cx ask about:
‚ûú Grillz/Chain recommendation
‚ûú Grillz/Chain in general
‚ûú Grillz/Chains pricing

Venus et Fleur: Thank you for reaching out! Good question! This depends on the selected shipping method. All of our arrangements ship with UPS or FedEx. Certain arrangements are eligible for same day hand delivery if the order is placed before 2 pm and is being delivered to NJ or NY. You are able to choose a delivery date for all of our arrangements at checkout, and we do offer next day delivery as long as the order is placed before 6 pm EST.

Hope this helps! If you have any questions, feel free to text me.

I'm in my
*Ny

Venus et Fleur: Good question! Since you are in NY, if the arrangement is eligible for local hand delivery and you place your order before 2 pm, you can select Saturday as your delivery date at checkout.

If the arrangement ships via UPS or FedEx, please select next day shipping and place the order before 6 pm EST to receive it on Saturday.

The available delivery dates will show at checkout based on the item and your address.

important: When sending a link, if you see a "/" at the end of the URL, remove it
send_to_cs: Send to CS for damaged items that aren't available on the website
escalate: ESC immediately if the order is delivered, but cx did not receive it
ESC if cx wants to use an expired code
ESC sales end date questions
ESC invalid codes / expired code issues
Before ESC for retroactive discount requests, check if the item is on sale or if they met the minimum
Don't make suggestions of replacements - if unsure, ESC
ESC false advertising complaints
ESC if cx state they regret placing the order after the CANCEL/ORDER temp has been sent
Before ESC products not functioning properly
‚Üí Inquire what exact brush/product they have
‚Üí Provide any user guides available
Don't ask for the cx's shipping address as secondary info, include their phone number instead
tone: Keep messages shorter and more direct
Don't use the term "cart tracking", or let cxs know we can see what they have in their cart
templates: If the cx asks where there order is, and it's a confirmed order within the standard processing and shipping time, only share the "Order status/order tracking" temp
If the cx reaches out saying they're having issue with their code, first use CWW temp
If cx needs assistance with brush function/operations use FOQ shortcut
For product complaints/bad experiences use PBE shortcut
If cx says they're dentists/hygienists & want to shop use RDH shortcut
If cx is a short amount away from reaching the $100 threshold for the welcome discount to apply use SRT shortcut
If cx ask why their order was canceled, use MOC shortcut
If cx purchased from their dentist and looking for rebate ($30, $20, $10 back) use RBT shortcut
For post-purchase issues with Amazon orders, use PS shortcut
For post-purchase issues where cxs are dental professionals, dentists, hygienists, use DPS shortcut
dos_and_don_ts: If customers are looking for brush heads always confirm what type of brush they have, iO or non iO
If you can't find the products on the website, refer to this one https://crest.com/en-us
Hold to policy and do not offer to check if deviation from policy is acceptable
If customers ask about the warranty registration code OR say it's not accepting theirs (they might refer to it as a promo code for registration)- send them this one OB59185 (it's always the same)
drive_to_purchase: For general recommendations use CFR shortcut
Always refer cxs to iO series products, when possible
promo_and_promo_exclusions: The $85 welcome promo code isn't for % off, once applied a free item is added to the cart
Please check the last letters of a code to determine when they were sent
‚Üí I.e. WCOBDC means it is a December code (DC) and will likely expire in Jan
Discount codes do not work on Amazon
If cx is looking for a discount on replacement brush heads, encourage to subscribe for savings on the product page

important: When sending a link, if you see a "/" at the end of the URL, remove it
send_to_cs: Send to CS for damaged items that aren't available on the website
escalate: ESC immediately if the order is delivered, but cx did not receive it
ESC if cx wants to use an expired code
ESC sales end date questions
ESC invalid codes / expired code issues
Before ESC for retroactive discount requests, check if the item is on sale or if they met the minimum
Don't make suggestions of replacements - if unsure, ESC
ESC false advertising complaints
ESC if cx state they regret placing the order after the CANCEL/ORDER temp has been sent
Before ESC products not functioning properly
‚Üí Inquire what exact brush/product they have
‚Üí Provide any user guides available
Don't ask for the cx's shipping address as secondary info, include their phone number instead
tone: Keep messages shorter and more direct
Don't use the term "cart tracking", or let cxs know we can see what they have in their cart
templates: If the cx asks where there order is, and it's a confirmed order within the standard processing and shipping time, only share the "Order status/order tracking" temp
If the cx reaches out saying they're having issue with their code, first use CWW temp
If cx needs assistance with brush function/operations use FOQ shortcut
For product complaints/bad experiences use PBE shortcut
If cx says they're dentists/hygienists & want to shop use RDH shortcut
If cx is a short amount away from reaching the $100 threshold for the welcome discount to apply use SRT shortcut
If cx ask why their order was canceled, use MOC shortcut
If cx purchased from their dentist and looking for rebate ($30, $20, $10 back) use RBT shortcut
For post-purchase issues with Amazon orders, use PS shortcut
For post-purchase issues where cxs are dental professionals, dentists, hygienists, use DPS shortcut
dos_and_don_ts: If customers are looking for brush heads always confirm what type of brush they have, iO or non iO
If you can't find the products on the website, refer to this one https://crest.com/en-us
Hold to policy and do not offer to check if deviation from policy is acceptable
If customers ask about the warranty registration code OR say it's not accepting theirs (they might refer to it as a promo code for registration)- send them this one OB59185 (it's always the same)
drive_to_purchase: For general recommendations use CFR shortcut
Always refer cxs to iO series products, when possible
promo_and_promo_exclusions: The $85 welcome promo code isn't for % off, once applied a free item is added to the cart
Please check the last letters of a code to determine when they were sent
‚Üí I.e. WCOBDC means it is a December code (DC) and will likely expire in Jan
Discount codes do not work on Amazon
If cx is looking for a discount on replacement brush heads, encourage to subscribe for savings on the product page

escalation_preferences: All product complaints or bad experiences with a product

conversation.message_text: Brilliant Earth: Welcome to Brilliant Earth! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.
Brilliant Earth: Hi! I'm Ava, your personal jewelry concierge. Do you have any questions I can help answer? brilliantearth.attn.tv/aKP0HT5Q_x2B .
I want to be entered into $1000 gift card engagement ring

Brilliant Earth: Thanks for your interest! You will receive one (1) entry for subscribing to email marketing messages and one (1) entry for subscribing to SMS marketing messages. You can read more details here: https://brilliantearth.attn.tv/aAOZMT1Va-Ro/ 

In the meantime, are you looking for anything in particular? Do you have any specific style, or material in mind? I'd recommend checking out this page to select your ideal engagement ring setting and pair it with a Beyond Conflict Free Diamond: https://brilliantearth.attn.tv/akXUZM2-aaUV
https://share.google/SX5UVwV4pBpq9Jks6
Thai would be my dream ring, trying to figure out how to bring the price down
Template used: "No promotions available"; last updated: 2025-07-21 16:54:43.544
Template used: "Do you offer financing or layaway?"; last updated: 2025-07-21 16:52:58.141

Brilliant Earth: Great choice! We price fairly from the start rather than marking up our items to mark them down. We opt to run promotions that feature diamond earrings or other fine jewelry that act as sparkling additions to the lifelong, heirloom-in-the-making investment in a Brilliant Earth design. Our current promo can always be found on our website: https://brilliantearth.attn.tv/agTzIBvWws1-

For our US customers, we offer Affirm financing with interest rates from as low as 0% APR with approved credit, as well as Wells Fargo special 12-month financing with approved credit. We also offer a layaway option that allows customers to pay for their purchase with 20% down and monthly installments. You can learn more about our flexible payment options here: https://brilliantearth.attn.tv/aiaTYJkWKhnE

send_to_cs: Inquiries regarding orders
Shipping inquiries on a current order
Post-purchase issues
For product or general inquiries you can't find the answer to, use PGI shortcut
escalate: No escalations for this client, send everything to CS
tone: Don't use the word "unfortunately" to discuss our appointment structure
Don't use the word "best" to reference a product (e.g., best ring, etc.)
templates: If cx are looking for an engagement ring and don't provide specifics, use LER shortcut
dos_and_don_ts: If the customer responds incorrectly to the journey, don't send jny temp, recommend items based on their selection instead
Cx can create their own engagement ring on the webiste by choosing a setting, stone and size
Cx can customize rings by working with designers who will use their ideas, drawings, images to create the ring they want
Don't disclose the locations of their labs/production facilities
drive_to_purchase: Be MORE SALESY, if the customer is showing intent to purchase then:
‚ûú Ask open-ended general questions such as style & material
‚ûú After asking open-ended questions, transition to specific questions such as center stone, etc.
‚ûú If the customer liked our recommendation, push for the sale by asking about payment options or when they hope to have the item
promo_and_promo_exclusions: Please see here for current offer details: https://www.brilliantearth.com/promo-codes-and-offers/
Codes can be used in-store

I recommend cleariing your browser cache or trying a different device/browser to see if the approval button appears. Let me know how it goes!

When ESC on weekends, use WKD shortcut before you ESC

tone: Close the convo once the client takes over

templates: If cx are trying to upload a photo on the website and it's not coming through, use PWU shortcut
If cx are inquiring about delivery dates, use GRN shortcut
If cx share image/screenshot that's not showing don't ask to send again, use IMG shortcut

Don't mention possible shipping delays
Don't ask for screenshots

What is different between thermella and relizen?
Template used: "What is the difference between Thermella and Relizen?  "; last updated: 2024-09-11 21:13:19.145

Bonafide: Thank you for reaching out! I apologize for the late response. 

Thermella and Relizen were both shown in separate clinical studies to relieve hot flashes and night sweats. However, Thermella relieves hot flashes as early as just two weeks. It relieves hot flashes at the source by blocking NKB, a peptide in the body's thermoregulatory center that triggers hot flashes and night sweats. 

On the other hand, Relizen works as early as two months by inhibiting the reuptake of serotonin in the body. Both treatments are effective, but Thermella has been shown to provide more hot flash and night sweat relief, faster. 

Please note that these results for Thermella and Relizen are based on separate clinical studies for each product.
